original_text:
Maximus Payus
Il tema di questa slot prodotta dalla Inspired è l’antica Roma, più precisamente durante il periodo di massima espansione, racchiuso tra il 117 D.C. sino al 140 D.C.
È durante questi secoli che le tecniche di guerra dell’esercito romano hanno permesso di sconfiggere numerosi nemici e di raggiungere ogni terra al tempo conosciuta. Proprio ai valorosi centurioni è dedicata questa slot, con una grafica che ricorda quella dei cartoni animati. La griglia di gioco di colore viola è trasparente e lascia intravedere sullo sfondo il colonnato del Colosseo. Nella parte bassa sono presenti le informazioni riguardanti la scommessa e sulla sinistra sono posizionati il tasto start e quello per accedere al menù. A sinistra invece abbiamo l’icona per modificare la nostra puntata e il cursore attraverso cui è possibile attivare l’opzione “Fortune Bet”. Ogni giro è accompagnato dallo squillo delle trombe e dal suono meccanico dei rulli.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
La griglia è composta da 5 rulli e 3 linee e ci sono ben 1.024 modi per vincere. La puntata minima per ogni Spin è di 0,20 €, la massima di 60 €, un range di scommessa che si adatta a ogni tipo di tasca.
Dalle impostazioni è possibile attivare un cursore per mancini, in questo modo il tasto Start e quello per accedere alle impostazione verrà spostato sulla destra. È inoltre presente il pulsante Turbo che accelera la rotazione dei rulli.
Maximus Payus ha un RTP (return to player o ritorno teorico al giocatore) pari al 95% e volatilità alta.
Simboli e funzionalità di Maximus Payus
In ordine di valore, i simboli che pagano meno sono quelli relativi alle carte da gioco, 9, 10, J, Q e K e A. A seguire troviamo i simboli tematici: l’elmo e lo scudo con le spade incrociate hanno lo stesso valore, poi troviamo la biga e il Colosseo. A pagare più di tutti è però il centurione.
La coroncina di alloro con la scritta Wild è il nostro simbolo Jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter, rappresentato dall’aquila imperiale e la dicitura Bonus. 3 simboli Bonus ripagano con 8 Free Spins, con 4 se ne avranno 15 e con 5 simboli speciali si potrà avere 20 giri gratuiti. Inoltre, attivando l’opzione Bet Fortune, il simbolo Bonus aumenterà di dimensione, aumentando sensibilmente le possibilità di vincita. Durante i giri gratuiti può capitare che sui rulli appaia un moltiplicatore x2 e nel caso atterrino simboli Wild, essi verranno moltiplicati insieme, ottenendo alla fine un moltiplicatore pari a x8. Se durante i giri gratuiti compariranno altri simboli Bonus, avremo dei giri aggiuntivi:

2 simboli Bonus regalano 5 Free Spins
3 simboli Bonus regalano 8 Free Spins
4 simboli Bonus regalano 15 Free Spins
5 simboli Bonus regalano 20 Free Spins

Durante il gioco regolare poi è possibile avere due diversi tipi di Bonus del tutto casuali. Il primo dà diritto a una vincita di livello o pari a 20x, il secondo regala 5 o più simboli uguali.

raw_translation.response:
Maximus Payus

The theme of this slot produced by Inspired is ancient Rome, specifically during the period of maximum expansion, between 117 AD and 140 AD. These centuries saw the Roman army's war techniques defeat numerous enemies and conquer all known lands. This slot is dedicated to the brave centurions, with graphics reminiscent of cartoons. The game grid, in purple, is transparent and reveals the Colosseum's colonnade in the background. Information about the bet is at the bottom, with the start button and menu access on the left. On the left, we have the icon to modify our bet and the cursor through which we can activate the "Fortune Bet" option. The sound of trumpets and mechanical reel noises accompany each spin.

Main features of the slot machine

The grid consists of 5 reels and 3 rows, with 1,024 ways to win. The minimum bet per spin is €0.20, and the maximum is €60, suitable for every pocket. Left-handed players can activate a slider, moving the Start and Settings buttons to the right. A Turbo button is also available, accelerating the reel rotation. Maximus Payus has a 95% RTP (return to player) and high volatility.

Symbols and features of Maximus Payus

In order of value, the lowest paying symbols are the playing cards 9, 10, J, Q, K, and A. Then come the thematic symbols: the helmet and shield with crossed swords have the same value, followed by the chariot and the Colosseum. The centurion, however, pays the most. The laurel wreath with the Wild inscription is our Wild symbol and replaces all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the imperial eagle and the Bonus caption. Three Bonus symbols repay with 8 Free Spins; four symbols award 15, and five special symbols give 20 free spins. Moreover, by activating the Bet Fortune option, the Bonus symbol increases in size, significantly increasing the chances to win. During free spins, a x2 multiplier may appear on the reels, multiplying with any Wild symbols present, up to a x8 multiplier. If additional Bonus symbols appear during free spins:

- 2 Bonus symbols give 5 free spins;
- 3 Bonus symbols give 8 free spins;
- 4 Bonus symbols give 15 free spins;
- 5 Bonus symbols give 20 free spins.

During the base game, two different random bonuses are possible. The first grants a level win or 20x, while the second awards 5 or more matching symbols.

Experience the power of ancient Rome and win big with Maximus Payus!

Maximus Payus
This slot produced by Inspired is set in ancient Rome, specifically during its period of maximum expansion from 117 AD to 140 AD. It was during these centuries that the Roman army's war techniques allowed them to defeat numerous enemies and reach every known land at the time. This slot is dedicated to the valiant centurions, with graphics that resemble those of cartoons. The purple game grid is transparent and reveals the backdrop of the Colosseum's colonnade. Information on the bet is displayed in the lower part, and on the left, there are buttons for starting the game and accessing the menu. On the left, we also have the icon for modifying our bet and the slider through which we can activate the "Fortune Bet" option. Each spin is accompanied by the sound of trumpets and the mechanical noise of the reels. 

Key features of the slot machine
The grid consists of 5 reels and 3 lines and there are a whopping 1,024 ways to win. The minimum bet for each spin is 0.20 €, the maximum is 60 €, a betting range that suits every pocket. From the settings, you can activate a left-handed slider, which will move the Start and Settings buttons to the right. There is also a Turbo button that speeds up the rotation of the reels. Maximus Payus has an RTP (return to player) of 95% and high volatility.

Symbols and Features of Maximus Payus
In order of value, the symbols that pay less are those related to playing cards, 9, 10, J, Q, K, and A. Next, we find the thematic symbols: the helmet and shield with crossed swords have the same value, then we have the chariot and the Colosseum. However, the centurion pays the most. The laurel wreath with the word Wild is our Wild symbol and replaces all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the imperial eagle and the Bonus wording. 3 Bonus symbols pay 8 Free Spins, 4 pay 15, and 5 special symbols give you 20 free spins. In addition, by activating the Bet Fortune option, the Bonus symbol will increase in size, significantly increasing your chances of winning. During free spins, a x2 multiplier may appear on the reels and if Wild symbols land, they will be multiplied together, resulting in a multiplier of x8. If Bonus symbols appear during free spins, additional spins are granted:

2 Bonus symbols award 5 Free Spins.
3 Bonus symbols award 8 Free Spins.
4 Bonus symbols award 15 Free Spins.
5 Bonus symbols award 20 Free Spins.

During regular play, there are also two different types of entirely random bonuses. The first entitles you to a level win or one equal to 20x, and the second awards 5 or more identical symbols.

message.content:
Maximus Payus
This slot produced by Inspired is set in ancient Rome, specifically during its period of maximum expansion from 117 AD to 140 AD. It was during these centuries that the Roman army's war techniques allowed them to defeat numerous enemies and reach every known land at the time. This slot is dedicated to the valiant centurions, with graphics that resemble those of cartoons. The purple game grid is transparent and reveals the backdrop of the Colosseum's colonnade. Information on the bet is displayed in the lower part, and on the left, there are buttons for starting the game and accessing the menu. On the left, we also have the icon for modifying our bet and the slider through which we can activate the "Fortune Bet" option. Each spin is accompanied by the sound of trumpets and the mechanical noise of the reels. 

Key features of the slot machine
The grid consists of 5 reels and 3 lines and there are a whopping 1,024 ways to win. The minimum bet for each spin is 0.20 €, the maximum is 60 €, a betting range that suits every pocket. From the settings, you can activate a left-handed slider, which will move the Start and Settings buttons to the right. There is also a Turbo button that speeds up the rotation of the reels. Maximus Payus has an RTP (return to player) of 95% and high volatility.

Symbols and Features of Maximus Payus
In order of value, the symbols that pay less are those related to playing cards, 9, 10, J, Q, K, and A. Next, we find the thematic symbols: the helmet and shield with crossed swords have the same value, then we have the chariot and the Colosseum. However, the centurion pays the most. The laurel wreath with the word Wild is our Wild symbol and replaces all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the imperial eagle and the Bonus wording. 3 Bonus symbols pay 8 Free Spins, 4 pay 15, and 5 special symbols give you 20 free spins. In addition, by activating the Bet Fortune option, the Bonus symbol will increase in size, significantly increasing your chances of winning. During free spins, a x2 multiplier may appear on the reels and if Wild symbols land, they will be multiplied together, resulting in a multiplier of x8. If Bonus symbols appear during free spins, additional spins are granted:

2 Bonus symbols award 5 Free Spins.
3 Bonus symbols award 8 Free Spins.
4 Bonus symbols award 15 Free Spins.
5 Bonus symbols award 20 Free Spins.

During regular play, there are also two different types of entirely random bonuses. The first entitles you to a level win or one equal to 20x, and the second awards 5 or more identical symbols.

Additionally, there are two random bonus features during regular play.

response.headline: Gameplay
response.content: Maximus Payus is a 5-reel, 3-line slot with 1,024 ways to win and high volatility. The game takes place in ancient Rome, and the graphics resemble those of cartoons. Each spin is accompanied by the sound of trumpets and the mechanical noise of the reels. The purple game grid is transparent and reveals the backdrop of the Colosseum's colonnade, while the lower part shows the bet information and the buttons to start the game and access the menu.

response.headline: Symbols and Paytable
response.content: The symbols that pay less in Maximus Payus are those related to playing cards (9, 10, J, Q, K, and A). Thematic symbols include the helmet and shield with crossed swords, the chariot, the Colosseum and the centurion, which pays the most. The laurel wreath with the word Wild is the Wild symbol and the Scatter is represented by the imperial eagle and the Bonus wording. The Bonus symbol can appear during free spins, and 3, 4 or 5 symbols award 8, 15, and 20 free spins, respectively. By activating the Bet Fortune option, the Bonus symbol will increase in size, significantly increasing your chances of winning. During free spins, a x2 multiplier may appear on the reels, and if Wild symbols land, they will be multiplied together, resulting in a multiplier of x8.

response.headline: Betting Options
response.content: The minimum bet for each spin in Maximus Payus is 0.20 €, and the maximum is 60 €, which makes the game accessible to all players. The game offers a left-handed slider that moves the Start and Settings buttons to the right, and a Turbo button that speeds up the rotation of the reels.

response.headline: Bonuses and Features
response.content: Maximus Payus offers both free spins and random bonuses. Three Bonus symbols pay 8 free spins, 4 pay 15, and 5 special symbols give you 20 free spins. Bonus symbols can appear during free spins, and 2, 3, 4 or 5 symbols award 5, 8, 15, and 20 free spins, respectively. During regular play, two different types of entirely random bonuses can activate, the first entitles you to a level win or one equal to 20x, and the second awards 5 or more identical symbols.

response.headline: Volatility and RTP
response.content: Maximus Payus has an RTP (return to player) of 95% and high volatility. This means that while you may not win as often as with a low volatility game, when you do win, you can expect the payouts to be higher.

review_with_topics.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Maximus Payus".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Gameplay
Symbols and Paytable
Betting Options
Bonuses and Features
Volatility and RTP

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Each spin is accompanied by the sound of trumpets and the mechanical noise of the reels. 

Key features of the slot machine
The grid consists of 5 reels and 3 lines and there are a whopping 1,024 ways to win. The minimum bet for each spin is 0.20 €, the maximum is 60 €, a betting range that suits every pocket. From the settings, you can activate a left-handed slider, which will move the Start and Settings buttons to the right. There is also a Turbo button that speeds up the rotation of the reels. Maximus Payus has an RTP (return to player) of 95% and high volatility.

Symbols and Features of Maximus Payus
In order of value, the symbols that pay less are those related to playing cards, 9, 10, J, Q, K, and A. Next, we find the thematic symbols: the helmet and shield with crossed swords have the same value, then we have the chariot and the Colosseum. However, the centurion pays the most. The laurel wreath with the word Wild is our Wild symbol and replaces all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the imperial eagle and the Bonus wording. 3 Bonus symbols pay 8 Free Spins, 4 pay 15, and 5 special symbols give you 20 free spins. In addition, by activating the Bet Fortune option, the Bonus symbol will increase in size, significantly increasing your chances of winning. During free spins, a x2 multiplier may appear on the reels and if Wild symbols land, they will be multiplied together, resulting in a multiplier of x8. If Bonus symbols appear during free spins, additional spins are granted:

2 Bonus symbols award 5 Free Spins.
3 Bonus symbols award 8 Free Spins.
4 Bonus symbols award 15 Free Spins.
5 Bonus symbols award 20 Free Spins.

During regular play, there are also two different types of entirely random bonuses. The first entitles you to a level win or one equal to 20x, and the second awards 5 or more identical symbols.

This slot produced by Inspired is set in ancient Rome, specifically during its period of maximum expansion from 117 AD to 140 AD. response.headline: Gameplay
response.content:
If you're a fan of ancient Rome and cartoon graphics, then Maximus Payus is the slot game for you! With 5 reels, 3 lines, and 1,024 ways to win, this high volatility game will have you feeling like a Gladiator in no time. But don't worry, you don't have to fight lions to win big. All you need is a bit of luck and some good old-fashioned button pressing.

With every spin, you'll hear the sound of trumpets and the mechanical noise of the reels, creating an immersive experience that will transport you back in time. And with a transparent purple game grid, you can keep an eye on the backdrop of the Colosseum's colonnade while you play.

But let's not forget about the important stuff - the bet information and buttons to start the game and access the menu are conveniently located in the lower part of the screen. So sit back, relax, and let Maximus Payus take you on a journey to ancient Rome (without the risk of getting eaten alive).

faq.answer: The symbols are playing cards 9, 10, J, Q, K and A, the helmet and shield, the chariot, the Colosseum, the centurion, and the Wild symbol represented by a laurel wreath with the word Wild.

faq.question: What is the Bonus symbol in Maximus Payus?
faq.answer: The Bonus symbol is represented by an imperial eagle and the word Bonus. It can trigger free spins if 3 or more land on the reels.

faq.question: What are the rules for triggering free spins?
faq.answer: 3 Bonus symbols pay 8 Free Spins, 4 pay 15, and 5 special symbols give you 20 free spins. During free spins, a x2 multiplier may appear on the reels and if Wild symbols land, they will be multiplied together, resulting in a multiplier of x8. If Bonus symbols appear during free spins, additional spins are granted (2 Bonus symbols award 5 free spins, 3 award 8, 4 award 15, and 5 award 20).

faq.question: What is the Bet Fortune option in Maximus Payus?
faq.answer: The Bet Fortune option increases the size of the Bonus symbol, giving you a higher chance of triggering the free spins round and landing additional spins.

faq.question: Are there any random bonuses in Maximus Payus?
faq.answer: Yes, there are two different random bonuses in the game. The first entitles you to a level win or one equal to 20x, and the second awards 5 or more identical symbols.

faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Maximus Payus".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Maximus Payus
This slot produced by Inspired is set in ancient Rome, specifically during its period of maximum expansion from 117 AD to 140 AD. It was during these centuries that the Roman army's war techniques allowed them to defeat numerous enemies and reach every known land at the time. This slot is dedicated to the valiant centurions, with graphics that resemble those of cartoons. The purple game grid is transparent and reveals the backdrop of the Colosseum's colonnade. Information on the bet is displayed in the lower part, and on the left, there are buttons for starting the game and accessing the menu. On the left, we also have the icon for modifying our bet and the slider through which we can activate the "Fortune Bet" option. Each spin is accompanied by the sound of trumpets and the mechanical noise of the reels. 

Key features of the slot machine
The grid consists of 5 reels and 3 lines and there are a whopping 1,024 ways to win. The minimum bet for each spin is 0.20 €, the maximum is 60 €, a betting range that suits every pocket. From the settings, you can activate a left-handed slider, which will move the Start and Settings buttons to the right. There is also a Turbo button that speeds up the rotation of the reels. Maximus Payus has an RTP (return to player) of 95% and high volatility.

Symbols and Features of Maximus Payus
In order of value, the symbols that pay less are those related to playing cards, 9, 10, J, Q, K, and A. Next, we find the thematic symbols: the helmet and shield with crossed swords have the same value, then we have the chariot and the Colosseum. However, the centurion pays the most. The laurel wreath with the word Wild is our Wild symbol and replaces all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the imperial eagle and the Bonus wording. 3 Bonus symbols pay 8 Free Spins, 4 pay 15, and 5 special symbols give you 20 free spins. In addition, by activating the Bet Fortune option, the Bonus symbol will increase in size, significantly increasing your chances of winning. During free spins, a x2 multiplier may appear on the reels and if Wild symbols land, they will be multiplied together, resulting in a multiplier of x8. If Bonus symbols appear during free spins, additional spins are granted:

2 Bonus symbols award 5 Free Spins.
3 Bonus symbols award 8 Free Spins.
4 Bonus symbols award 15 Free Spins.
5 Bonus symbols award 20 Free Spins.

During regular play, there are also two different types of entirely random bonuses. The first entitles you to a level win or one equal to 20x, and the second awards 5 or more identical symbols.
